OR

{

   "actionInput": the input to the action, just a simple JSON object, enclosed in curly braces, using \" to wrap keys and values. Remember to use the Tool Schema.
}

Examples: 

{
   "thought": "To find out who won the Copa America in 2024, I need to search for the most recent and relevant information."

   "actionInput": {"query":"Copa America 2024 winner"}
}

other

{
   "thought": "To find out who won the Copa America in 2024, I need to search for the most recent and relevant information."
   "action": "self_question",
   "actionInput": {"query":"Copa America 2024 winner"}
}

### Observation

{
   "observation":  "Reflect about the result of the action. (E.g:  I got the following results from the tool Can I get the Final Answer from there?)", 
    "isFinalAnswerReady": false // If you have the final answer or not

results.title: Event Guest List Template - Word | Google Docs - Highfile
results.content: Get ready to organize your next event with ease using this elegant event guest list template. Designed to help you keep track of guests, RSVPs, and even invitations, the minimalist style ensures everything stays in order. With clean rows for name, phone number, and more, it's as simple as it is functional.

results.title: Guest List Template | Jotform Tables
results.content: Whether you're hosting a party, corporate event, or family gathering, you can keep RSVPs and guest details organized in a professional online spreadsheet. Start by customizing this template to suit your needs — then fill out the attached attendance form to update your sheet with guest details automatically!

results.title: Event Guest List Management & Invitee Tracking - RSVPify
results.content: Event Guest List Management & Invitee Tracking - RSVPify Guest List Management Guest List Management & Tracking Everything you need to manage your guest list from the first invitation to the last thank-you note Manage Your Guest List Our easy-to-use spreadsheet and guest list management software make it easy to create and import your list of guests. Event Management Event Check-In Guest List Management The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. - Desserts:

  - Fresh Fruit Tart
  - Assorted Cookies

- Estimated total for catering for approximately 100 guests: $8,000 (including food, service, and additional costs). This is based on an approximate cost of $80 per person.
